titleStmt.title: An Appendix to the catalogue of Mr. James Partridge's books consisting of a choice collection of English books in divinity, history, law, romances, poetry, physick, and chirurgery ... in all volumes : to be sold by auction on Monday the 16th of this instant December ...
titleStmt.author: Partridge, James.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
